author: supal
title: Diego Costa to sign mega £57m new Chelsea contract worth £220,000 a week after turning down China move
text:
Comments CHELSEA will make Diego Costa their top-paid player with a £57million deal. 
SunSport understands Costa and his representatives have reached an agreement in principle that will see him sign a five-year deal worth £220,000 a week PLUS bonuses which could send his pay soaring to £65m. And that would leapfrog Cesc Fabregas in the Stamford Bridge salary stakes. 
The Brazilian-born Spanish striker, 28, had seemed certain to quit in the summer even after the Blues rejected Chinese club Tianjin Quanjin’s £30m-a-year offer. 
Costa was dropped for the win at Leicester amid fears over his future. But he returned when Chelsea agreed to new contract talks. PA:Press Association Costa has been lethal in front of goal in Chelsea’s march to the title Burnley 1-1 Chelsea : Robbie Brady nets stunning free kick after Pedro opener 
The deal would take him into the top five Prem earners where Wayne Rooney is No 1 on £300k a week. 
Italian boss Conte told the BBC’s Premier League Show : “Is everything calm now? Yes. 
“Diego is a really important player. Getty Images 3 Italian boss Antonio Conte has reinvigorated Costa after a dry season last year 
“The situation is very clear. He is very happy to stay with us. He is very happy to fight for the title. 
“Will he stay here for a long time? Yes, I think so. I think so. 
“I see him every day and I see his commitment, his behaviour is very involved in the team. He loves this club.”
